
\beginhymn Jubilate Deo.

\moveleft10mm\vtop{
\hsize120mm

\resetlayout

\def\Notes{\vnotes4}
\def\NOtes{\vnotes5}
\def\NOTes{\vnotes6}

\def\lati#1{\cchar{-6}{#1}}
\def\engl#1{\cchar{-11}{\itlyrics #1}}

\rmlyrics

\setclef1{\treble}
\smallmusicsize
\belowsystem{8}
\generalsignature{+1}
\generalmeter{\meterfrac42}
\startpiece
\NOTes\rchar{10}{I}\lati{Ju-}\ha{g}\en
\NOTes\lati{bi-}\ha{g}\en
\NOTes\lati{la-}\engl{Rejoice,}\ha{f}\en
\NOTes\lati{te,}\ha{g}\en
\bar
\NOtes\rchar{10}{II}\lati{ju-}\qa{g}\en
\NOtes\lati{bi-}\qa{'a}\en
\NOtes\lati{la-}\qa{'b}\en
\Notes\rchar{-6}{te}\ibd1{'c}{-1}\qb1{'c}\en
\Notes\tb1\qb1{'b}\en
\NOtes\lati{De-}\engl{rejoice in God}\qa{'a}\en
\NOtes\lati{o}\qa{'d}\en
\NOtes\lati{om-}\qa{'b}\en
\NOtes\lati{nis}\qa{'a}\en
\bar
\NOTes\lati{ter-}\engl{all the earth}\rchar{10}{III}\ha{g}\en
\NOTes\lati{ra,}\ha{d}\en
\NOTes\lati{ju-}\ha{d}\en
\NOTes\lati{bi-}\ha{g}\en
\nextline
\NOtes\lati{la-}\rchar{10}{IV}\qa{'b}\en
\NOtes\lati{te}\qa{'c}\en
\NOtes\lati{om-}\qa{'d}\en
\Notes\rchar{-6}{nis}\engl{rejoice all the earth,}\ibd1{'c}{1}\qb1{'c}\en
\Notes\tb1\qb1{'d}\en
\NOtes\lati{ter-}\qa{'d}\en
\NOtes\lati{ra,}\qa{'a}\en
\NOtes\qr\en
\NOtes\lati{psal-}\qa{'d}\islur0\en
\bar
\Notes\rchar{10}{V}\ca{'d}\tslur0\en
\Notes\lati{li-}\ca{'d}\en
\NOtes\lati{te}\qa{'c}\en
\NOtes\lati{in}\engl{sing out with joy!}\qa{'b}\en
\Notes\rchar{-6}{l\ae -}\ibu1{'a}{-1}\qb1{'a}\en
\Notes\tb1\qb1{g}\en
\NOtes\lati{ti-}\qa{'a}\en
\NOtes\lati{ti-}\qa{'a}\en
\NOTes\lati{a!}\ha{g}\en
\setrightrepeat
\endpiece

}
